snippet: The Federal Trade Commission recently shut down five “robocalling” firms that it says are responsible for millions of illegal telemarketing calls, including the familiar pre-recorded messages from “Rachel.”
abstract: The Federal Trade Commission recently shut down five “robocalling” firms that it says are responsible for millions of illegal telemarketing calls, including the familiar pre-recorded messages from “Rachel.”

headline.main: Goodbye to Rachel From Cardholder Services
